memberdef.argsstring: (const void *inputBuffer, void *outputBuffer, unsigned long framesPerBuffer, const PaStreamCallbackTimeInfo *timeInfo, PaStreamCallbackFlags statusFlags, void *userData)
memberdef.name: patestCallback

briefdescription.para: Play different tone sine waves that alternate between left and right channel.

detaileddescription.para: The low tone should be on the left channel.
